name: New Hidden Objects
description:
Hidden Objects

GET THE BEST HIDDEN OBJECTS GAME ON Appstore By Prophetic Games!

Hidden Objects is a free game in which will be challenged like never before!

In this game principle like Find a series of hidden objects in a scene! Various objects and environments are available allowing you to replay a scene several times in different configurations!

Hidden Objects. You have to find more and more objects that hidden on the pictures.  If you want unlock the each level, you must find all the hidden objects in the current levels or you must watch video. If you need assistance,than use the hint.

You can also choose different Environment and use hints that will show you the location of an item from the scene. However, these hints are limited so use them carefully or come to the store to unlock them all.

Finding objects is a great way to exercise your mind and keep sharp! This game will definitely improve your hand-eye coordination and concentration!

Features:
-Find and solve Objects! -HIDDEN OBJECTS scenes change every time you play! -Twenty of items to find and collect! -CONTINUOS updates with new scenes! -NO Internet connection required to play! -FREE hidden object game! -HIGH resolution graphics! -Hints available to help you find objects! -Pinch and zoom feature to find smaller objects if necessary! -20 Stunning Enchanted Levels

MODES:
-Pictures:- A Kid Friendly Mode -Silhouettes:- Challenging Silhouettes and Shadows!

Forget all the point and click adventures and dive right into the mysterious world of Hidden Objects and enjoy Hidden Objects.
